entries.journal_entry_description: Practice your rifle skills by attacking the Droids. There are some in the Armory and in the Training Room.
entries.task00_journal_entry_description: Practice with the rifle on the droids.
entries.task00_journal_entry_title: Destroy the Droids in the Ranged Combat Training Room
entries.task01_journal_entry_description: Talk to Loche again, now that you have practiced on a few droids.
entries.task01_journal_entry_title: Return to Loche in the Ranged Combat Training Room
